channel.title: Awaaz Samachar
channel.desc: The host presents top stories and headlines and all the action from the world of markets, industries, government, entertainment, sports and more.

channel.title: Commodity 360?
channel.desc: The host invites eminent experts to discuss the latest trends and developments in India's commodity market and further touch upon the factors that impact the production of various commodities.
